mapper.sql: pk_user, pk_group, pk_org, code, name, password, sex, birthday, phone, address, note, creator, creationtime, modifier, modifiedtime, dr, ts
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from bd_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_user (pk_user, pk_group, pk_org, code, name, password, sex, birthday, phone, address, note, creator, creationtime, modifier, modifiedtime, dr, ts) values (#{pkUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pkGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pkOrg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

pk_user,
pk_group,
pk_org,
code,
name,
password,
sex,
birthday,
phone,
address,
note,
creator,

mapper.update:
update bd_user
pk_user = #{record.pkUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pk_group = #{record.pkGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pk_org = #{record.pkOrg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},

creationtime = #{record.creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifiedtime = #{record.modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{record.dr,jdbcType=BIT},
ts = #{record.ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update bd_user set pk_user = #{record.pkUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pk_group = #{record.pkGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pk_org = #{record.pkOrg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creationtime = #{record.creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedtime = #{record.modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{record.dr,jdbcType=BIT}, ts = #{record.ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update bd_user
pk_group = #{pkGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where pk_user = #{pkUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}
